Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: The perfect spot for morning coffee. The owner greets you in Italian, speaks a little English, and is super friendly. My double espresso cost three euros and was as good as any I've had in Italy.

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: The perfect Italian seduction! I was walking by the store by the time it was opening, so I had the chance to see the preparation of the goodies. Everything is freshly made with best quality ingredients. I tried the Ricotta and strawberry pie and it was heavenly good. Also the owner is the sweetest traditional Italian man.

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text:
Not a person to leave reviews but this place deserves every bit of it.

I crossed this place often and was always tempted to try the food as everything ‚Ä¶

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: I'm so happy that I found this place. It started to grow in me, the only critic that I have is the microwave reheating food, it is possible to do it differently. They use very nice products, though

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: I've been coming here for years and it's my local favorite for Italian breakfast (coffee + dolce) and lunch. It's perhaps so good that it's in the top 3 of things I missed the most during WFH in the corona lockdowns. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: The food was tasty and the place authentic but the hygiene is an absolute no-go. Touching the food with unwashed hands + a very dirty and messy kitchen/dining area ruined the experience entirely.

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Located in a great central position, 2 minutes walk from Dam Square. Great authentic italian food freshly made everyday by the owners. A bit pricy, but absolutely justified by location and quality. Vegetarian and vegan options available too

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: A great place where to eat real Food and the owners are so nice. I highly recommend it if visiting Amsterdam.

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: The homemade tiramisu is one of the best tiramisus I've ever tasted. A beautiful little place in busy Amsterdam.

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Real Italian! Great espresso and food. Cosy atmosphere.

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Very good restaurant and delicious kitchen! I recommend this tiny restaurant üòâ

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Its just a small place, but I liked that about it. In a big city like Amsterdam I appreciated the cosy sized place and atmosphere. Very Italian, lovely options for ciabatta sandwiches, croissants and bruschetta. I got a pan au chocolate, ‚Ä¶

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Nice coffee and good croissant. I just tried it for breakfast. I can see also focaccia and other things looking really good.

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Allways a welcome feeling when you step through the door. But most importantly: everything tastes so incredibly good and is made fresh.. ‚ù§

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Have lunch here at least once a week, so delicious and authentic! Owners/staff so incredibly friendly, one of my favorite places in Amsterdam center for lunch.

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Great place for coffee and sandwich

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Authentic Italian food. The pasta was a poem! üëåüèª

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: I would give this place 5000 stars if I could!

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Real Italian food. Excellent!

Review Text:

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Soup was ok. Toasted sandwiches were good but expensive, but I don't expect these to be much cheaper in the center of the city. Cheese cake great.

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Amazing! Generous! Great value for money ‚ô°‚ô°‚ô°

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Delicious, friendly, tasty, Tuscany in the heart of Amsterdam,...I won't say more, otherwise you'll think I was paid to write my opinion.

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Best Italian place in town!!!! Lovely tratment and authentic and delicious italian food!!! Highly recommended!

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Small but VERY good Italian restaurant in downtown Amsterdam. Fresh food, friendly staff, nice location.

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Delicious food, reasonably priced, fantastic fresh ingredients

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Excellent, small place for a snack according the real Italian taste... One of the hidden treasures of the town

Name: Pane & Olio
Review Text: Delicious authentic Tuscan food, very friendly staff and good wine! Alla prossimaü§óüåà

Review Text: The best place in the city centre to have lunch. Fabio is so friendly! :)
